properties.entry: SELECT PLACE_NO ,PLACE_TITLE ,CATEGORY_NO ,WRITER ,LOCATION_NO ,MAKE_DATE ,P.STATUS ,PHONE ,ADDRESS ,PLACE_CONTENT ,START_TIME ,END_TIME ,STAR_POINT ,PLACE_URL ,VIEW_COUNT ,USE_TIME ,USE_PRICE ,BEST_STATUS ,FILE_PATH || '/' ||CHANGE_NAME "TITLEIMG" ,LIKECOUNT FROM TB_PLACE P JOIN TB_FILE F ON ( REF_NO = PLACE_NO ) WHERE LOCATION_NO = ? AND CATEGORY_NO = ? AND FILE_LEVEL = 1 AND P.STATUS = 'Y' ORDER BY LIKECOUNT DESC

SELECT PLACE_NO ,PLACE_TITLE ,CATEGORY_NO ,WRITER ,LOCATION_NO ,MAKE_DATE ,P.STATUS ,PHONE ,ADDRESS ,PLACE_CONTENT ,START_TIME ,END_TIME ,STAR_POINT ,PLACE_URL ,VIEW_COUNT ,USE_TIME ,USE_PRICE ,BEST_STATUS ,FILE_PATH || '/' ||CHANGE_NAME "TITLEIMG" ,LIKECOUNT FROM TB_PLACE P JOIN TB_FILE F ON ( REF_NO = PLACE_NO ) WHERE PLACE_NO = ? AND FILE_LEVEL = 1 AND P.STATUS = 'Y'
